Title: Struggling for the glory of the socialist nation
Designer: Revolutionary committee of North China Sewing Machine Factory (华北缝纫机厂革命委员会)
Publisher: Tianjin renmin meishu chubanshe (天津人民美术出版社)
Notes: The banners in the back read "Long live Chairman Mao, Long long live!", "Industry studies Daqing", and "Independence and Self-reliance". The slogan on the worker's jacket reads "Grasp revolution, increase production".
